attributes.action: fumes from charcoal barbecues and compost are a health hazard
attributes.additional_details:
fumes from charcoal barbecues(unless natural without
added chemicals,which most aren't) cause immediate respiratory
illnesses and cancer in long expose. much worse than normal bonfires or natural charcoal.pls can you
check the air quality of them as they are all day on warmest days. gas bbq better alternative&easier to
clean too. ALSO: spores from composts cause respiratory illnesses if not done properly&in tightly
closed containers&attract vermin&nasty biting flies.
